name: Big Mike's Burger Dystopia
description:
Description:

Big Mike's Burgers is an action adventure tile-based game about storming a malicious fast-food restaurant in search of a stolen cow. The player is tasked with conversing with various NPCs, collecting key items, and managing their health with healing items as they trade blows with hostile NPCs during combat sequences. 

Controls:  Basic Movement: W to move forward one tile. D and A to rotate 90 degrees. S to turn around 180 degrees. Left Mouse button to click on interactable items. B/F to Heal. 

Combat: A and D to slide the potlid shield from side to side. Move mouse side to side to move the spatula. Left-click to swipe at the enemy with the spatula. Enemy attacks are telegraphed via exclamation points which the player can move their shield over to block.

Restarting:
Currently, when the player dies, there is no option to restart, so closing the game manually and restarting the application is required.
